name: Demon Skies
description:
Equipped with your enchanted bow and arrow, survive as long as possible in the evil demon infested skies! You've only got the one life and the one arrow... so good luck!

Move with WASD keys, or ARROW keys. Click and release to fire an arrow (when retrieved) ,touch the corner of the screen to flip to the opposite side, the same goes with the arrows!

Hope you like it! More can be potentially added if I find the time to work on it, and if there is enough demand :D Want more like this? Follow my profile! 

- Sound FX made with ChipTone
- Music by wyver9 and brainstormesque from newgrounds
- Art made with Piskel

Shoutout to HeyAlex who made some videos on the game! [CLICK HERE]
